title: Have you ever put things in your anus? - Quora

response.answer_text: As often as possible, which is nearly always. I’m an anal only woman, which means I only have anal sex, not vaginal. I’ve been anal only since 2010. And as of this year, I’m also double anal only, which means my two boyfriends always fuck my ass together at the same time. That happens at least daily, often more, since we’re all working from home all the time. When I don’t have cock in my ass, I often have a big dildo or two up my ass several times a day for an hour or more at a time—sometimes just sitting with them in me, sometimes actively masturbating if I have the time, and I wear a large butt plug if my ass is otherwise unoccupied while at home, or a smaller one if I’m out.
